text: I hope they come up with a simple solution soon. It seems to be requested quick often...
Can u link me to your page?

Dynamic pages will work by creating a page for each row in the table. Not clear on whats the issue.. Did you check multi-level dynamic pages to achieve the product-subcategory path you are looking for? <https://designers.HubSpot.com/how-to-build-multilevel-dynamic-templates?_ga=2.194738603.725349078.1607439789-1175727122.1550602398>

Iâ€™m wondering if when creating options in the fields section if there is a way to allow the content editor to pick multiple items from a hubDB table? I see I can include a hubdb table field but it only allows me to select a table not select multiple fields that would be living within the table. Is there a way to do what I want to without having to manually enter all options as repeated choices but rather pulling the data from the table and letting the content editor make selections that way?
I think they created this for enterprise custom objects and omitted it from regular HubDB tables
